name: Beer, Axe & Gold
description:
Take Minchiari to all the gold and the beer in this world!

Throw axes, drink beer, collect gold and prove your skill in this platformer!

The game is pretty fair and playable by everyone, but the real challenge comes from getting all the gold in the levels.

The game is heavily inspired by some pico-8 games and is made with speedrunning in mind! It's still in development, there are actually more than 20 levels, the playtime is 1 hour and half or two~ and i'm planning to add more levels very soon.

HOPE TO SEE YOUR SPEEDRUNS SOON!
